title: Time tracking and cost reporting - OpenProject
content: On this page   Time tracking, cost tracking and reporting video tutorial   Frequently asked questions (FAQ)   Does OpenProject provide resource management? Time tracking, cost tracking and reporting video tutorial Frequently asked questions (FAQ)   Does OpenProject provide resource management? Does OpenProject provide resource management? Time tracking and cost reporting Time and costs functionality in OpenProject allows keeping track of the resources, both in terms of labor and budgets. With OpenProject you can always keep control of the time and costs planned for and spent on the projects. Create budgets, log time and costs on specific work packages and create time and cost reports based on your needs. Time tracking, cost tracking and reporting video tutorial Watch this short video to get a first overview about time and cost reporting in OpenProject. Your browser does not support the video tag. Frequently asked questions (FAQ) Does OpenProject provide resource management? Please note that OpenProject currently does not yet support resource management. However, this is scheduled in our roadmap as one of our main topics. Our use cases provide examples for workarounds to support resource management within OpenProject.
